name: conformity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that follows the usual standards that are expected by a group or society: It's depressing how much conformity there is in such young children.
(also conformance) the process of a product being made as it was designed, without mistakes or faults: Our goal is to improve conformity with customer requirements. conformity to specification
